title: The Gary Null Show
content:
Health Updates: adverse affects of being overweight- damages the heart, shrinks the brain; grapes; diabetics face... <!--more--> shorter life span; personal motivation influences healing; young people value self-esteem more than sex or money.
Isabella Thomas has two autistic children who were part of the original 12 patients in the Royal Free study reported in the Lancet by Drs Wakefield, Walker Smith, Murch and colleagues.
It is this 1998 study by Wakefield, subsequently retracted by the publication, that has caused such a furor over the MMR vaccine and which is now the basis for the witch hunt against Wakefield in the UK.
Isabella has 4 sons- 2 received the MMR vaccine and now have autism & serious bowel problems, and two who did not receive the MMR & are fine.
